name: 17th Century Hunting Lodge
description:
DESCRIPTION
Your wedding at the Château. Come and sample the French countryside living "ART DE VIVRE"
Situated between two beautiful villages the Château is easily accessible by car and by train. Less than an hour from Paris, push the doors of Château. This former 17th century hunting lodge will offer you a grandiose and princely setting for the most beautiful celebration of your life. Let yourself be seduced by this decor worthy of fairy tales and experience a magical and unforgettable stay in the company of your loved ones.
Antoine and Clary dreamed of bringing their family estate back to life in the great tradition of hospitality upheld by their ancestors for centuries, so that you may experience the luxury of their home. You will benefit from services adapted to your needs and from all the comforts necessary for the smooth running of this event.
The whole ground floor of our home is devoted to our guests: hall, large salon, breakfast parlour and dining-room.
Clary and Antoine will take care of you for your special day!
This charming property is the perfect place to spend a few days in advance of (and/or after) the big day in order to prepare and get yourself ready as well as on the day itself, offering a host of options for your celebrations, including the reception, cocktail party and ceremony.
The Château is located in a 10 hectare park dotted with century-old trees, meadows and a small lake. Your reception will be able to take place in this natural and bucolic environment which could also be the scene of an outdoor reception.
Inside the hunting lodge, you will find an old fruit tree restored in the dining room for your banquet and which will be able to accommodate from 8 to 40 people. The chateau also has a lounge for a cocktail or dinner.
The Château has 5 guest rooms, two of which are family rooms. Fifteen people will be able to stay at the chateau after your festivities. Take the opportunity to relax after this emotional day.
Rates
Time of arrival on day 1 is from 4:00pm and the rooms must be vacated on the final day by 1:00pm
Hire of the premises:
(5 bedrooms, of which 2 are family rooms, max. total 15 people)
2 nights: €1610 incl. tax (breakfast included)
Dinner possible the night before the wedding day: €20 per person (wine not included)
Wellness & beauty package
On site on Saturdays only, on other days it is at the college 4km away.
Body massage
Body massage and facial
Facial
Manicure*
Hairstyling
Tea and pastries to share, max. 14 people: €10 per person and with more than 8 persons: 8€ per person
Please do get in touch for more information!
